A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's unnecessary long\, but offers some of the most epic battles and character interactions in the saga. Main plot is a unique combat situation not seen before in the saga\, though it was damaged by some poor dialogues and useless parallel stories that were not even attractive. Silly sometimes\, but brave and sharp in some others\, distances from the infamous enormous galaxy led by a small Royalty Family. It invites a broader audience to embrace a fairy tale that used to be only for geeks.
